#include <iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

inline ll apowb(ll a, ll b)
{
ll r=1;
while(b>0)
{
if(b%2==1) r = r *a;
b/=2;
a=a*a;
}
return r;
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
	ll n;
	cin>>n;
	int flag=0;
	double d,left,right;
	for(int i=2;i<=55;i++)
	{
	d = pow(n, (double)1.0/ (double)i);
	left= ceil(d);
	right = floor(d);
	ll p = apowb((ll)left,i);
	ll q = apowb((ll)right,i);
	if(p==n || q ==n)
	{ flag = 1;
	break;
	}
	}
	if(flag==1) cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	else
	cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
